_comment: RAGE Events Data - Manual entry based on AfterGame data. Update events below with real information from https://aftergame.app/groups/rage
_instructions: 2. Click on each upcoming event to get details
3. Copy the information into the events array below

_template.title: RAGE Game Night (or specific event title)
_template.description: Event description from the event page
_template.location: Venue name and address (e.g., Fratelli's Pizza Parlour, 1774 California St, Redding)
_template.featured: true|false (set first/most important event to true)
